reviews.text: Delicious Chicken Tenders.

I stopped by Crispy Grill on Nostrand late at night and got 2 combos, the chicken sandwich and chicken tender.
What a great deal!($22 for a big sandwich, fries, and a can).
The food was fresh and delicious.
The only thing I would mention is that the buffalo chicken had a bit too much hot sauce.
Overall, great value and tasty food. I'd definitely recommend it.
Sucks they won't pick up the phone and when someone answers they hang up
Good food! Recommend!
Great food!!!

Very generous portions and reasonably priced. Burger/fries combo for 20 bucks.  Chicken fingers were crispy. Love the option of being able to add a pretzel bun to my burger. Totally underrated new place. Welcome to midwood/Flatbush, can‚Äôt wait to come back!
Food was good, fries were really good. Portions and prices were decent, they threw in a bunch of extra sauces on the side. Food was ready quickly. Would order from again.
Ate here after shabbos this weekend and was not disappointed! They make a great fried chicken sandwich. When I'm in the area I'm definitely going to come back.
